heading: Look at Gaming #97
special_insights:
powered by AppMagic.rocks üòé
We all know South Korea is one of the most gaming-forward nation in the world ‚Äî and they're living up to that reputation as we recently saw NCSoft partnering with Sui and today Npixel is collaborating with Aptos.  So I wanted to dig into the Korean publisher market to see whats going on.  The top 5 publishers are NCSoft, 37Games, Netmarble, Kakao Games Corp., and Com2uS.  In total for 2022, they generated $3.06B with 122M downloads.  Comparing these figures to yesterday's Finnish publishers, we see that SK publishers know how to crank up that monetization or more likely SK gamers are wiling to simply spend more.
